content:
Hi
I am wondering if _filter can be used to join multiple resources. The available example show only join depth to be 1.

Observation: subject.name co "pet"

Is it intended to be depth > 1 such :

Observation: subject.generalPractitionner.name co "bob"

"give me all observation for patient who have bob as practitionner"

?

Thanks

The _filter spec explicitly mentioned chaining:
"A 'path' is a name, with chained searches done by name.name etc.as per existing source. There can also be a filter: name[filter].name." And the paramPath is defined recursively in the grammar.
In theory sure, but don't assume every server will support chaining.
